DOC.brief_summary: Study evaluate effect AUGMENTIN 1gm treatment Skin Soft tissue infection
DOC.brief_title: AUGMENTIN 1gm In Skin And Soft Tissue Infection
DOC.criteria: diagnose uncomplicated soft tissue infection ( e.g furuncle , cellulitis ) give freely documented consent . antibiotic renal hepatic insufficiency systemic toxicity pregnancy lactation hypersensitivity penicillin Betalactam antibiotic
